DOC.brief_title: HPMPC ( Cidofovir ) Peripheral CMV Retinitis Trial Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: In Stage 1 , 30 patient randomize either observation deferral treatment retinitis progress ( observation group ) , intravenous HPMPC high dose two consecutive weekly induction dos , follow low dose every week maintenance . In Stage 2 , 70 patient randomized observation HPMPC high dose two consecutive weekly induction dose follow either dose every week maintenance , total three treatment group . Concomitant saline hydration probenecid administer patient receive HPMPC .
